Package org.apparatus_templi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventGenerator  
    EventWatcher  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlankControllerDriver
    A blank driver to be used as a template for a controller module.
    BlankSensorDriver
    A blank driver to be used as a template for a sensor module.
    ControllerModule
    An abstract class for a driver that controls a remote module containing motors, switches, relays and the like.
    Coordinator
    Coordinates message passing and driver loading.
    DeviceDetectedEvent  
    Driver
    An abstract class for a basic driver.
    DriverHandler  
    Echo  
    Event  
    LargeCommands
    A debugging driver used to test message fragmentation.
    LazyDriver  
    LedFlash
    A driver that controls a remote array of LED pixels.
    Local  
    Log
    Logging facilities for Coordinator and the drivers
    Message  
    MessageCenter
    Handles message fragmentation and de-fragmentation.
    MotionEvent  
    MotionGenerator
    A sample driver that generates simulated motion tracker events every few seconds.
    MotionWatcher
    A sample driver that registers itself to watch for motion events
    SensorModule
    An abstract class for a driver that interacts with a remote module containing at least one sensor.
    SerialConnection  
    ServerDriverTest  
    SimpleHttpServer  
    SleepyDriver  
    StatefullLed
    A driver for a remote module with a number of LEDs.
